borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p><span style="font-size:11pt">1<strong>.&nbsp;</strong>The proposed side extension fails&nbsp;to respect and reflect the existing dwellinghouse and&nbsp;it would partially close off an important gap within the street scene and is considered unbalanced within the street scene with regards to its scale and massing in comparison to the original dwellinghouse. Furthermore, the proposed part hipped, part flat roof of the double storey side extension is of an incongruent design and would&nbsp;represent&nbsp;an uncharacteristic addition to the dwellinghouse which would be harmful to the character and appearance of the street scene, dwellinghouse, terrace and local area. The impact of the proposed extension positioned on this open corner plot on the character of the historic&nbsp; Becontree Estate identified above adds further weight to the harm caused by this development. Hence the proposal will be contrary to the:</span></p><ul><li><span style="font-size:11pt">National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Policies7.1, 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">policies D1 and D4 of the Draft London Plan</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Policy CP2 of the Core Strategy DPD</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Policies BP2 and BP11 of the Borough Wide DPD and policies</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">DM16, DM11 and SP4 of the Draft Local Plan</span></li></ul><p><br></p>

<p><span style="font-size:11pt">The scale, siting and design of the proposed development would result in an increased sense of overbearingness and a harmful loss of outlook and daylight to neighbouring occupiers, therefore constituting unneighbourly development and contrary to: -</span></p><ul><li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size:11pt">National Planning Policy Framework (MHCLG, February 2019);</span></li><li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size:11pt">Policies BP8 of the LDF Borough Wide Development Plan Policies DPD (March 2011); </span></li><li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size:11pt">The Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document (February 2012)</span></li><li style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size:11pt">Policies DM16 of the Draft Local Plan (Regulation 18 Consultation version, November 2019).</span></li></ul><p><br></p>
description: Construction of a two storey side extension.
